SELECT GOODS_NO, NAME, CONTENT, READCNT, REGDATE, PRICE, RELATED, KEYWORD, CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE_NO, WM_CONCAT(GOODS_SIZE) AS GOODS_SIZE, WM_CONCAT(COLOR) AS COLOR, WM_CONCAT(COUNT) AS COUNT, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY GOODS_NO DESC) RNUM FROM ( SELECT a.GOODS_NO, a.NAME, a.CONTENT, a.READCNT, a.REGDATE, a.PRICE, a.RELATED, a.KEYWORD, a.CATEGORY, b.ATTRIBUTE_NO, b.GOODS_SIZE, b.COLOR, b.COUNT FROM GOODS a INNER JOIN GOODS_ATTRIBUTE b ON a.GOODS_NO = b.GOODS_NO WHERE ROWNUM < 15 ORDER BY b.ATTRIBUTE_NO ASC )
GROUP BY GOODS_NO, NAME,CONTENT, READCNT, REGDATE, PRICE, RELATED, KEYWORD, ATTRIBUTE_NO, CATEGORY
